Comments_List: I gained a better instinct for how proteins interact with membranes and the general properties of lipids.
principle about biological membrane, and membrane protein
I learned a lot about membrane proteins.
The small class size is a big strength of the class. The homeworks are fair and help to solidify concepts from the course. The course is good the way it is, no need for improvement.

strength: the course is well organized, the assignment is good
weakness: I wish we could have paper discussion in the class
This course provides a lot of knowledge but I feel it doesn't really correlate enough with literature and real-life scientific researches.

I would recommend this course to another because most students end up working with membranes either transiently or as a focus of their work and it is good to get exposure to the basics which are normally skipped in other courses or don't get as much attention. The relaxed environment of the course is a good contrast to those that stress on exams and final projects, without sacrificing the valuable information conveyed in the course.
yes, i think the course deepened my understanding on biological membrane a lot.
Yes. I would recommend it. You get to know a lot of stuffs and you don't get pressured by homework grades or exams.
